Address.value: 11465 JOHNS CREEK PARKWAY,SUITE 400, JOHNS CREEK, Georgia, 30097, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Saia Inc is a transportation company. The company through its wholly-owned subsidiaries provides less-than-truckload, non-asset truckload, expedited and logistics services across the United States. It generates revenues from the transportation of freight.
